articles.title: Argentina's new economy chief highlights plans to boost reserves
articles.description: President Alberto Fernandez tapped Massa as economy minister a couple of weeks ago, making him the country's third economic chief in barely a month, amid a severe economic slump fueled by sky-high inflation and growing street protests. "We're negotiating three (debt) repurchase agreement mechanisms," Massa said during a speech at a think tank event in Buenos Aires.
articles.content: Argentina's latest economy minister, Sergio Massa, stressed the need to boost hard currency reserves in a speech on Thursday, pointing to new debt repurchase operations that could help, as well as advances in talks with the country's key farm sector.... [2136 chars]

articles.title: Gilgeous-Alexander headlines Canada's roster for World Cup qualifiers
articles.description: TORONTO — Oklahoma City guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander headlines Canada's men's basketball roster for the next World Cup qualifying window. Canada plays Argentina on Aug. 25 in Victoria and then travels to Panama for a game on Aug. 29.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina's new economy chief highlights plans to boost reserves
articles.description: Argentina's latest economy minister, Sergio Massa, stressed the need to boost hard currency reserves in a speech on Thursday, pointing to new debt repurchase operations that could help, as well as advances in talks with the country's key farm sector.
articles.content:
Argentina's new Economy Minister Sergio Massa attends a news conference after being sworn in, at the Economy Ministry in Buenos Aires, Argentina, August 3, 2022. REUTERS/Matias Baglietto/File Photo

articles.title: LATAM POLITICS TODAY-Argentina's new economy chief to go to Washington for finance talks
articles.description: The latest in Latin American politics today: Argentina's new economy chief to go to Washington for finance talks BUENOS AIRES - Argentina's latest economy minister, Sergio Massa, will travel to the United States next month to meet with key finance leaders at the International Monetary Fund, among others, amid a severe economic slump fueled by sky-high inflation.
articles.content:

articles.title: Napoli signs Argentina forward Simeone on loan from Verona
articles.description: Napoli signed Argentina forward Giovanni Simeone on loan from Hellas Verona on Thursday.The 27-year-old Simeone the son of Atltico Madrid coach Diego Simeone has already taken part in his first training session with his new teammates.Napoli has the option to sign Simeone on a permanent basis at the end of the season.Simeone scored 17 goals in 35 appearances for Verona last season.
articles.content:
Napoli signed Argentina forward Giovanni Simeone on loan from Hellas Verona on Thursday.
The 27-year-old Simeone — the son of Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone — has already taken part in his first training session with his new teammates.
